00022     class RefData
00023     {
00024             std::string mHandle;
00025 
00026             MWScript::Locals mLocals; // if we find the overhead of heaving a locals
00027                                       // object in the refdata of refs without a script,
00028                                       // we can make this a pointer later.
00029             bool mHasLocals;
00030             bool mEnabled;
00031             int mCount; // 0: deleted
00032 
00033             // we are using shared pointer here to avoid having to create custom copy-constructor,
00034             // assignment operator and destructor. As a consequence though copying a RefData object
00035             // manually will probably give unexcepted results. This is not a problem since RefData
00036             // are never copied outside of container operations.
00037             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::CreatureStats> mCreatureStats;
00038             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::NpcStats> mNpcStats;

00040             boost::shared_ptr<ContainerStore<RefData> > mContainerStore;

00048                 return mHandle;

00052             {

00056             void setLocals (const ESM::Script& script)
00057             {
00058                 if (!mHasLocals)
00059                 {
00060                     mLocals.configure (script);
00061                     mHasLocals = true;
00062                 }
00063             }

00083             }

00087                 mEnabled = true;
00088             }
00089 
00090             void disable()
00091             {
00092                 mEnabled = true;
00093             }
